name: scss-mixins-spinners
description: Performant CSS+HTML spinners implemented as SCSS mixins
author: Stephen Johns <steve@stevejay.net> (http://www.perspectivespace.com)

scripts.build: rimraf ./build && copy scss/*.scss build && copy package.json build && copy README.md build && copy LICENSE build
scripts.example-publish: git subtree push --prefix example origin gh-pages
